backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining job roles, employees, leave entries, contact messages, user profiles, and access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two logo‑navigation features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend React components and pages.
frontend/BUILDING.md: Build and deployment guide describing prerequisites, environment setup, and commands for running the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global design tokens, light/dark color variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app router configuration defining all public and protected HR dashboard routes using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied screen for unauthenticated or unauthorized users with options to log in or return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state, including error recovery and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter name and email, saving the profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Wraps protected content, showing a loading spinner during init and blocking access for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleProtect: Route guard similar to ProtectedRoute but intended for role-based access, blocking unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Form for submitting contact messages with validation and mutation handling, showing loading and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactM: Renders a sorted list of contact messages with sender info, timestamps, and read status badges.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactS: Contact page section combining an animated contact form and contact info panel with optional title and description.
frontend/src/components/employees/Employ: Form for creating or updating an employee, handling validation and calling mutations for create or salary update.
Displays a table of employees with key details and a button to navigate to an employee detail page.
frontend/src/components/jobroles/JobRole: Form for creating a job role with validation and a mutation call to submit role data.
Renders a table of job roles showing title, location, status, and a link to the LinkedIn posting.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipCard.t: Reusable leadership profile card component displaying name, title, description, and a styled icon.
frontend/src/components/leaves/LeaveEntr: Panel showing total leave entries, a list of leave records, and a dialog to add new entries.
Form to submit a new leave entry with date validation and mutation to save the entry.
frontend/src/components/nav/FadeNavLabel: A wrapper component adding fade-in animation and hover effects to navigation labels.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileMenuTo: Animated hamburger/X icon that changes appearance based on the menu open state.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Public site layout with header, footer, navigation links, scroll‑to‑section behavior, mobile menu, and logo links routing to '/'.
frontend/src/components/salary/SalaryBre: Displays computed salary breakdown for an employee including base, bonus, deductions, and final payable.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Interactive service card with expandable details, feature list, and buttons for quick view and navigation to the service page.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Modal component showing a service’s icon, title, description, features, and a button to navigate to the full service page.
frontend/src/data/services.ts: Defines the Service interface and exports a list of service objects plus a helper to fetch a service by slug.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and triggers query invalidation when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapError.ts: Provides a static null bootstrap error state after removing bootstrap logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, employees, and other backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, dark theme settings, layout rules, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application bootstrap that sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, and leadership sections using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact header and embeds the ContactSection component with business hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with animated hero text, about, services, recruitment, and contact sections plus a quick view modal.
frontend/src/pages/hr/AccessManagementPa: Empty placeholder page for HR access management.
frontend/src/pages/hr/ContactMessagesPag: Shows contact form submissions with loading skeletons and a message list.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeeDetailPage: Displays detailed employee info with overview, leave management, and edit tabs plus loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/hr/EmployeesPage.tsx: Displays employee list with search, loading skeletons, and a dialog to add new employees.
frontend/src/pages/hr/HrLayout.tsx: Provides HR dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, mobile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/hr/JobRolesPage.tsx: Shows active job roles with loading states and a dialog to create new job roles.
frontend/src/pages/hr/QuickLeaveMarkPage: Form page for quickly marking employee leave with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/RecruitmentPage.tsx: Shows a list of open job roles fetched from an API with loading skeletons and LinkedIn links.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a selected service including features, description, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all services with quick view modal support.
frontend/src/utils/deployDiagnostics.ts: Collects and logs deployment diagnostics, environment data, and actor/identity initialization status.
frontend/src/utils/env.ts: Provides helpers to safely access environment variables and resolve Internet Identity URL.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formatting utilities for currency and timestamps into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/salary.ts: Calculates salary breakdown including base, bonus, deductions, and final payable amount.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Functions to scroll to page sections and map routes to section IDs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, plugin integrations, custom colors, animations, and layout extensions.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for the HR website and dashboard.
